name: R is for Dizziness!
description:
R is for Dizziness!

Press R to rotate the room and help Luca eat all the fruits in the game! 

⋆ Be careful some rooms contain deadly delicious donuts that will decrease your health point! ⋆

(👍 ͡• ͜ʖ ͡•)👍(👍 ͡• ͜ʖ ͡•)👍(👍 ͡• ͜ʖ ͡•)👍(👍 ͡• ͜ʖ ͡•)👍

After download and uncompressed the zip file, find R_for_rotate, that's the game.

Download V2 if you don't want to get too DIZZY!
